entry.title: Thank you so much!
entry.content: I've been looking for a photo editor made for the iphone 4 ever since my old one upgraded to ios 8. I tried others but they crashed instantly. I found this one today and it works great! Thank you!

Thank you so much!

I've been looking for a photo editor made for the iphone 4 ever since my old one upgraded to ios 8. I tried others but they crashed instantly. I found this one today and it works great! Thank you!

entry.title: Must have!
entry.content: Easy, versatile, with tons options! I love it. I miss the older layout but its still one of the best apps for photo editing.

Must have!

Easy, versatile, with tons options! I love it. I miss the older layout but its still one of the best apps for photo editing.

entry.title: Excellent
entry.content: I've been using 'Faded' for a long time to edit my photos, but I'll be definitely using Fotor more.... it has more detailed editing. I don't find it simple to use, but once u get used to it is an excellent photo editor. Recommended.

Excellent

I've been using 'Faded' for a long time to edit my photos, but I'll be definitely using Fotor more.... it has more detailed editing. I don't find it simple to use, but once u get used to it is an excellent photo editor. Recommended.

entry.title: Defeated My Purpose
entry.content:
Well, the App raves to be the "best photo resizing app" and yet I can do pretty much anything in it, besides RESIZING. Oh, the directions are very clear on the website, but when you get the app, good luck finding the Photo Resize option, because it does not exist. I am unable to do this on the website, as demonstrated in snapshots, because when you select "Get Started" it takes you to the App download page and when you're in the App itself this option is not available. Cropping does not have manual aspect ratio or dims entry option so you're SOL and this then becomes like any one of the other 9 photo editing apps I have on my phone. Anyone who has discovered this elusive function, please post it in a review as I have not gotten feedback yet from the help center.
Aggravated. Annoyed. Wasted time and phone memory por NADA.
👹

Defeated My Purpose

Well, the App raves to be the "best photo resizing app" and yet I can do pretty much anything in it, besides RESIZING. Oh, the directions are very clear on the website, but when you get the app, good luck finding the Photo Resize option, because it does not exist. I am unable to do this on the website, as demonstrated in snapshots, because when you select "Get Started" it takes you to the App download page and when you're in the App itself this option is not available. Cropping does not have manual aspect ratio or dims entry option so you're SOL and this then becomes like any one of the other 9 photo editing apps I have on my phone. Anyone who has discovered this elusive function, please post it in a review as I have not gotten feedback yet from the help center.

Aggravated. Annoyed. Wasted time and phone memory por NADA.

👹

entry.title: Scam alert
entry.content: I had spent about $20 in effects and other items, but can't restore any of them on my new iphone. This company (or individual?) wouldn't restore those purchases because they "don't know how."

Scam alert

I had spent about $20 in effects and other items, but can't restore any of them on my new iphone. This company (or individual?) wouldn't restore those purchases because they "don't know how."

entry.title: Mostly good
entry.content: It's my favorite photo editor, except it seriously downgrades images. I hate it. My phone can handle editing the full size photos I take with this. This app's "enhance" feature is what makes this app unique. I can't live without it.

Mostly good

It's my favorite photo editor, except it seriously downgrades images. I hate it. My phone can handle editing the full size photos I take with this. This app's "enhance" feature is what makes this app unique. I can't live without it.

entry.title: Awesome!
entry.content: I have used Fotor for a few years now, but I still love the classic templates the most! I have a clothing business and I am able to post pictures with close ups of the fabric or a specific design as well as a picture of the entire outfit and different pieces! Thanks Fotor for making this kind of posting so simple and easy to use!

Awesome!

I have used Fotor for a few years now, but I still love the classic templates the most! I have a clothing business and I am able to post pictures with close ups of the fabric or a specific design as well as a picture of the entire outfit and different pieces! Thanks Fotor for making this kind of posting so simple and easy to use!

entry.title: Easy to use & pretty powerful
entry.content: One of the best free apps out there. Even without add ons the basic functions are more than most people would ever need/care to understand. Definitely a go to when you just want a quick improvement on a shot or to throw together a fun collage.

entry.title: Great! (But please read and respond!)
entry.content: I'm a writer and this app is great for making covers, the problem is, i need to make one of titles for my covers italicized, but it wont let me? Whenever i click the bold/ italicized button it doesn't do anything and it grey when the other icons and options are white. How do i use the italicized? Hopefully that made sense!
